name: All Question Types
description: This sample is prepared to help you understand each question type in Audit Plus.  Each sample question contains a URL to its documentation.  There is also a sample file attached to each question to demonstrate the various file types that may be included for work instructions.  We have also added a few samples of properties.

questions.name: Text Entry Question Type
questions.description: The text question type can include a N/A button below for bypass.  The user may also scan a barcode to insert the answer.  There is a calendar button below to insert differing forms of times and dates.

questions.name: Number Entry Question Type
questions.description: The number question type is for numbers exclusively.  The template creator can select units when preparing the question.  There are also min and max fields, and the answer will fail if not in range.  The user can bypass the question using the N/A button below.  Finally, the answer can be scanned in.

questions.name: Location-Based Question Type
questions.description: Location is available in the audit details.  However, you can create a location-type question as well.  The user can type the location and coordinates will be added, or they may use the map button below to reverse geocode their location.  The user may bypass the question with the N/A button.

questions.name: Yes / No Question Type
questions.description: The most widely used question type in audits and checklists today is the Yes/No question type.  The question fails when answering no.

questions.name: OK / NOK Question Type
questions.description: The industry will often use OK / NOK as an alternative to Yes / No. The question fails when selecting NOK.

questions.name: Custom Question Type
questions.description: We provide a default custom question type for you.  You can add as many custom question types as you’d like using the menu in the question editor or via the app’s settings in the file browser.  Tap the URL below to learn more.

questions.name: Ratings Question Type
questions.description: This question type applies a rating with high/low labels of your choosing.  Selecting one star is failing.  The user may bypass the ratings question by selecting N/A.

questions.name: Multiple Choice  Question Type
questions.description: The following question allows for single and multiple answers to a question.  Its primary use may be for tests, but it’s available for audits as well.  Select the answers that pass the question.  Tick the multiple selection enabled switch to allow more than one answer.

questions.name: Slider Question Type
questions.description: The user may select an answer using a slider.  The range of the slider is determined by the slider min/max values.  The increment value is the step of the slider. Values outside the compliance min/max range are failing.

questions.name: Media Question Type
questions.description: The media button below asks the user to select media from their photo library, camera, scan document, files app and our own built in sketch.  Adding one media item will answer the question.

questions.name: Signature Question Type
questions.description: The signature button below will launch the signature entry screen.  The user simply has to sign and dismiss the screen and the signature will be applied to the question.
